Package alien4cloud.dao

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAggregationQueryManager<T>
    Extract query results from an aggregation rather than from the query.
    IESMetaPropertiesSearchContext  
    IESMetaPropertiesSearchContextBuilder  
    IESQueryBuilderHelper<T>
    Adapted version from elastic search mapping to add class management features.
    IESSearchQueryBuilderHelper<T>  
    IGenericIdDAO
    A DAO that allows accessing data by Id or / and multiple Ids.
    IGenericSearchDAO
    A Dao that supports search and/or filter based queries.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ESExceptionHandlingAspect
    Aspect to handles technical exceptions from Elastic Search.
    ESGenericIdDAO
    ElasticSearch DAO to manage id based operations.
    ESGenericSearchDAO
    Elastic search dao that manages search operations.
    ESIndexMapper
    Manages one or multiple indexes and the related java and elastic search types.
    FilterUtil
    Utility to build simple filters for ES mapping filtering.
    ResponseUtil
    Utility to process elasticsearch response.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    EsGeneratedId
    Annotation to tell alien4cloud to inject the id generated by elasticsearch in this property on read operations.
